welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Camberley, where the picturesque countryside meets bustling city life. Known for its rich history and quaint streets, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our vibrant city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farnborough Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Farnborough Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackbushe Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Blackbushe Airport offers luxury amenities for private flight passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at RAF Station Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Heathrow's oldest terminal, serving mainly domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern and spacious terminal, mainly used by Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The busiest terminal at Heathrow, serving a mix of long-haul and short-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used by SkyTeam and other international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Heathrow's newest terminal, exclusively used by British Airways and Iberia.

wifi.note: Free for 45 minutes, then a fee applies for longer use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northolt Airport caters to VIP and executive travelers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Benson Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively used for military flights and operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the airport's largest terminal, serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the airport's second largest terminal, serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with unlimited access for all passengers.
